mapper.select: SELECT A.uuid, A.ORG_SEQ as orgSeq, A.user_id as userId, A.discount, B.employee_no as employeeNo, B.user_name userName, B.tel,B.password FROM T_USER_GRANT_PASSWORD A LEFT JOIN T_USER_INFO B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.STATUS = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND A.ORG_SEQ = #{orgSeq} AND A.STATUS = 1

SELECT A.uuid, A.org_seq, A.user_id, A.discount, B.employee_no, B.user_name, B.tel, B.password FROM T_USER_GRANT_PASSWORD A LEFT JOIN T_USER_INFO B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.STATUS = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND A.ORG_SEQ = #{orgSeq} AND A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.STATUS = 1 LIMIT 1
